stories.title: New Atomic Clocks Measure Time Dilation at Millimeter Scale

stories.text:
https://stripe.com/treasury

I was very excited about it, but turns out you can't use it for one of the most interesting use cases imo, personal banking.

Are there other platforms that would allow me to form a "virtual banking provider"?

- Being able to issue people cards for personal use - Assign those cards to individual ACH-enabled accounts

I'd especially love a platform that doesn't require sales calls to get started since it seems like they tend to be tuned for established players.
stories.title: Stripe Treasury/Issuance Alternatives?

Russian hackers obtained defense information technology targeting US contractors

stories.text: 'What makes something a community?' is a question I ask myself frequently. I think HN tends to like to get meta about HN - but it leads me to wonder what people mean when they mention "the community." Do you consider yourself part of the "HN Community?" Why or why not?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is Hacker News a “Community?”
